name: RoseAnya
description:
Brief Summary:

Returning home from years away to study brings a feeling of nostalgia. Chasing after a hero of legend and his party brings about feelings of wonder and curiosity. Finding out the disappointing truth behind a long held tradition, religion, and belief brings bewilderment and dissatisfaction. Exploring a darkly whimsical world feels humorous and amusing.

Player Goals:

The player must search for a way to reverse the curse on her home village, which has transformed all of the villagers into anthropomorphic fish. On her search for the cure, she encounters various monsters and puzzles that stand as obstacles in her way. She must combat and converse with multiple colorful characters in her search, and discover the truth behind how the curse came to be. The player’s overall goal is to successfully complete each area in search for the next clue to the cure.

Tips:

Works best with keyboard and mouse.
